description:
After saving Akagi`s life, Yasuoka and Ohgi want to put him up against a monster whose been causing the recent string of mysterious deaths, in a high stakes game. The "monster" that he will face is Iwao Washizu. After spending two weeks with the Inaba group, Akagi finally receives the call for the match worth 20 million but there seems to be some frightening house rules put in place.
Source: crunchyroll
